name: Pet Axolotl || Axolotl Simulation v1.9
description:
Pet Axolotl Is A game Where You Can Simulate Having An Axolotl Feeding, Yawning, Colour, Hats, And Taking Photos!! Press The Keyboard Button Or Press The In-Game Button!! Have Fun With Your Axolotl!! And This Game Is Mobile Supported So Check It Out On Mobile For A Better Experience

                           ~~Update Log~~

July 19, 2021, ~~ Release Date ~~ v1.0

July 19, 2021 ~~ Land & Water Update ~~ v1.1

(Allows You To Bring Your Axolotl Pet Out Of The Water!)

July 20, 2021, ~~ Feeding Frenzy ~~ v1.2

(Allows You To Feed The Axolotl And It's Cute Face Only Happens When You Feed It Check It Out!!)

July 20, 2021, ~~ Hats!! ~~ v1.3

(Allows The Axolotl To Have Hats To Make It Extra Cute!)

July 23, 2021, ~~ TN ~~ v1.3.5

(I Updated The TN So You Can Tell It is Mobile Friendly)

July 23, 2021, ~~ Watermark ~~ v1.3.6

(Added this because someone just remixed my game and didn't give credit and tried to advertise it)

July 29, 2021, ~~ Photos!! ~~ v1.4.1

(You Can Finally Take Silly, Funny, Adorable Photos Of Your Axolotl!!)

Aug 19, 2021 ~~ Ghost Attack ~~ v1.4.3

(Newest Axolotl Kind)

Aug 31, 2021 ~~ Secret ~~ 1.4.5

(Secret Axolotl Available!!)

Oct 8, 2021 ~~ MORE ACCESSORIES ~~ 1.5

(5 New Accessories In Stock For Your Axolotls!!)

Oct 8, 2021 ~~ Mister Presdient Club!! ~~ 1.6

(Oh Boy The 2 Most Famous President Axoltols Shows Up In Their Limo)

Oct 19, 2021 ~~ Monarchy!!! ~~ v1.7

(Monarchy The King Has Arrived In Town. New Skin That's It Really)

Oct 31, 2021, ~~ Void Skin /w Pumpkin Hat!!! ~~ v1.8

(The Void Skin Has Arrived For Halloween With Its Last Enemy. Pumpkin Carving. Beware!! Mahahaha HAPPY HALLOWEEN)

Nov 4, 2021 ~~  Queen Elizabeth ~~ v1.9

(Since the king has been here we now have the Queen of England!!)

Games By @PandaPlayZs or riceINsushi On Other Platforms (sometimes)
